title: Baker Mayfield Is Named The Panthers' Starter
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Baker Mayfield being named the Panthers’ starting QB, Mike Tomlin’s comments on his QBs, the Buccaneers’ losses on their offensive line, and Dan and Laura join the show from MetLife Stadium. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Mike Tomlin comments on his quarterbacks and Baker Mayfield is named starter for the Panthers.
